title: Best Food
disctiption: Our commitment to authenticity extends to our ingredients. We source the finest Indian spices and basmati rice directly from India, ensuring a truly authentic taste experience. These premium ingredients are the foundation of our flavorful dishes, bringing the rich heritage of Indian cuisine to Bangkok.
aboutTitle: Imported spices and Basmati rice from India
aboutDis: Our commitment to authenticity extends to our ingredients. We source the finest Indian spices and basmati rice directly from India, ensuring a truly authentic taste experience. These premium ingredients are the foundation of our flavorful dishes, bringing the rich heritage of Indian cuisine to Bangkok.
aboutMisson: Our mission is to introduce Bangkok to the vibrant and diverse culinary heritage of India. We strive to capture the essence of authentic Indian street food, bringing the unique and delicious flavors of the subcontinent to the heart of Thailand.

testimonials.name: Krisana Subu
testimonials.message: Congratulations Bhuvan Bhai! Excellent Branding! Wish You Great Success in many more places in Thailand & I am happy to be your 1st Day 1st Thai-Indian Customer-Friend for your Inauguration Today! Loved your 3C‚Äôs Samosa-PaaniPuri-MangoAamPanna Juice & 1st Time Vodka-Tequila PaaniPuri! Thank You for bringing Samosa-Paani Puri to our Bearing-UdomSuk-Bangna area! Way To Go! üëèüëèüëç

testimonials.name: Shaz Godfrey
testimonials.message: What a beautiful and lovely place this was to get some authentic Indian food. Served with meticulousness and pride for the food they were serving and all with a warm friendly smile . A definite must for anyone! I will definitely be back ‚ò∫Ô∏è The food is delicious üòã

testimonials.name: Kout Kout
testimonials.message: The food is superb. You should try chicken samosa and potato ones. The service is amazing. I love the sauce. One more thing is reasonable price. Love the shop. Will be coming again.

testimonials.name: Manisha Agrawal
testimonials.message: Had one of the best Indian snacks at this find in Bangkok. A different take on pani puri with beet root and spinach, amazing filling with alu samosa, really flavourful sambar with idly. Finishing it off with the chai was really satisfying. Absolutely recommend this place.

testimonials.name: Rajesh K Mishra
testimonials.message: Great taste and variety of Paani Puris. Quite flavourful taste of Samosas. On top of this, the shop is located in a great location, open area with great vibes.

testimonials.name: SUWAN P. (R'Chai)
testimonials.message: Hot tea and the food you order are very delicious. You don't have to go to India. I got to try Indian food. It tastes good and is clean. I recommend it. The restaurant is next to the beer garden at Bearing Market.
